name: SofiLink
description: The package adds preprocessing functions to export properties to Sofistik Teddy (writing DAT Files). The package is especially developed for engineers to control the export and import to structural analysis. A bidirenctional link between parametric models can be created.
contents: Curve.DivideSegments - Divides curve into equal segments using hmin and returns points and station values., Curve.GetParameterValuesAtStations - This Node is based on the definition of a start and end parameter of the structural framing family. It returns the parameter values at the stations from a set of curves and elements., DAT.ReadParametersFromFile - Reads from 'parameters.dat' all defined parameter names and values., DAT.ReadParameterValuesFromFile - Reads from the 'parameter file' the parameter values at each station along the bridge axis 'A1'., DAT.WriteAxisToFile - writes points from spline to SOFiSTiK Axis., DAT.WriteAxisToFileOPT - writes points from spline to SOFiSTiK Axis., DAT.WriteDataToFile - Given a header and a body as a list this node will generate a DAT Sofistik File., DAT.WriteParametersToFile - Given an parameteric element and a set of parameter names it will translate these parameters with values to Sofistik variables., DAT.WriteParametersToFileOPT - Given an parameteric element and a set of parameter names it will translate these parameters with values to Sofistik variables., List.IndicesOfItems - returns indices of items occurence in list., List.RemoveItems - removes given items from list, Point.DivideSegments - Returns nodes from nurbsspline according to suplied segment length., Point.SegmentsToPlacements - returns Placement points from given segments., Point.ToSegments - Seperates list of section positions into segement lists., Revit.ProjectUnits - Set project units to meter.
